title: Positvity on Offense with Z100's Elvis Duran
description: Positivity is the only speed I know. Unfortunately we're living in a world where only the negative minority is heard, but if I had it my way, we'd make the positivity much louder. I've said it once and I'll say it again, my glass is always half full, even if all I've got is a drop. We need to stop focusing on the past and putting our energy into moving forward and being optimistic.
